A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I saw that this was getting a lot of conflicted reviews and thought I'd add my drop to the bucket.
There was definitely more Soap Opera in my Space Opera than I'm used to\, but that's not bad. The movie may have been long\, but it certainly didn't feel so.
The main plot involving Rey\, Luke\, Kylo\, and Snoke is phenomenal in my opinion and caries absolutely everything I love and expect in a star wars film. The whole Finn and Rose side adventure thing was admittedly a bit more on the nose at times than it needed to be\, and I do honestly think that whole thread could have been done away with\, but what else are you gonna have our beloved Finn do\, huh?
The whole running out of fuel and slowly watching the Rebellion die ship by ship as they ran\, the on the ship tension between the leadership\, and all that I thought was really good and I enjoyed it.
Just the whole Finn and Rose excursion was narratively unnecessary\, but was at least still a good time.
